newsitem.title: UK: WestLB sets warrants on the DAX and MDAX.
newsitem.headline: WestLB sets warrants on the DAX and MDAX.

text.p: Westdeutsche Landesbank says it has issued 390 million American-style call and put warrants, in marks, in 39 equal tranches, on the DAX and MDAX indices.
There are 27 tranches on the DAX (15 calls and 12 puts) and 12 tranches on the MDAX (7 calls and 5 puts).
PAYDATE 14.FEB.97 LISTING DDF FFT MIN EXER LOT 100
